text: Inovallée (contraction in French for the words innovation and valley) is a science park located at Meylan and Montbonnot-Saint-Martin near Grenoble in France. Created in 1972 with the acronym ZIRST,acronym ZIRST.lesechos.fr, A Grenoble, la ZIRST va étendre sa zone d'influence. it becomes Inovallée in 2005 and houses primarily companies in the fields of information and communications technology. In 2014, there are more than 362 companies and 11,174 people working in the park.lessor.fr, Inovallée confirme sa forte attractivité Inovallée also benefits from the close proximity of the Université Grenoble Alpes, Grenoble Institute of Technology and the Polygone Scientifique.Inovallée ==Companies and institutions== The major companies located at Inovallée are Naver Labs Europe, Orange labs, Dolphin Integration, Mirantis, Schneider Electric, Salesforce.comlemagit.fr, Salesforce ouvre un centre de R&D; à Grenoble. and also the French Institute for Research in Computer Science and Automation. ==References== == External links == *Official website Category:Grenoble Category:Science parks in France Category:High- technology business districts in France Category:Buildings and structures in Isère
title: Inovallée
